title: Today's AI boom will amplify social problems if we don't act now, says AI ethicist
description: AI systems trained on internet data are in danger of reinforcing negative bias and causing societal harm. Salesforce's Kathy Baxter explains how to fix it.

title: This $350 Lenovo Chromebook will change your mind about cheap laptops
description: Take everything you'd want in an everyday laptop and slap an affordable price tag on it. Lenovo somehow did just that.

title: This $7 medical tool is a surprising must-have in my workshop
description: Don't get into trouble for destroying someone's favorite scissors (like I used to!). Keep these on hand instead.
